title: Change time format from 23h23 to 23:23
content:
So I have a Pixel 3 XL set up in French, and the "h" in the time format 23h23 allows me to have only 2 notifications displayed in the top left corner when device is unlocked (the notch cuts off the rest)

I have seen videos of the pixel 3, and when set up in English, it seems to allow for one more notification space.

My question is: is there a way to change the time from at from using a "h" to using ":" without changing language?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
